article.title: Raytheon to Provide Air Traffic Navigation Upgrade Kits
article.text: Raytheon Co., Marlborough, Massachusetts, was awarded a $9,352,322 modification (P00048) to contract W31P4Q-14-C-0060 to procure and install 15 Version 8 upgrade kits to the Air Traffic Navigation Integration Coordination System and a test station. Work will be performed in Nashua, New Hampshire; and Marlborough, Massachusetts, with an estimated completion date of September 30, 2017. Fiscal 2015 other procurement funds in the amount of $9,218,345 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
